attributes.action: Wenger to honour his current contract until the end of season 18-19.
attributes.background: Arsene Wenger has never broken a contract. Its imperative he does not do so now because of minor protesting from a few fans forcing him to retire. The real Arsenal fans love Wenger and very much want him to stay. Sign this petition and lets demonstrate to Arsene in him we trust. WENGER IN!
